welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bellflower, a charming city known for its historic downtown, beautiful parks, and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that Bellflower has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the main terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers a more luxurious experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Main terminal with gates for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Secondary terminal with gates for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bob Hope Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport houses all commercial flights and amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Ynez Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free with a one-time registration.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport is a small, single-story building that houses the check-in counters, security checkpoint, and departure gates.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Chino Airport is a separate building that caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cable Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Van Nuys Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Van Nuys Airport caters to the needs of private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
